Sentencas: The requirements of low-cost and high-temperature corrosion resistance for bipolar interconnect plates in solid oxide fuel cell stacks has directed attention to the use of metal plates with oxidation resistant coatings.
Titulo: Using CrAlN multilayer coatings to improve oxidation resistance of steel interconnects for solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The performance of steel plates with multilayer coatings, consisting of CrN for electrical conductivity and CrAIN for oxidation resistance, was investigated.
Titulo: Using CrAlN multilayer coatings to improve oxidation resistance of steel interconnects for solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The coatings were deposited using large area filtered arc deposition technology, and subsequently annealed in air for up to 25 hours at 800 degreesC.
Titulo: Using CrAlN multilayer coatings to improve oxidation resistance of steel interconnects for solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The composition, structure, and morphology of the coated plates were characterized using Rutherford backscattering, nuclear reaction analysis, atomic force microscopy, and transmission electron microscopy techniques.
Titulo: Using CrAlN multilayer coatings to improve oxidation resistance of steel interconnects for solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: By altering the architecture of the layers within the coatings, the rate of oxidation was reduced by more than an order of magnitude.
Titulo: Using CrAlN multilayer coatings to improve oxidation resistance of steel interconnects for solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Electrical resistance was measured at room temperature.
Titulo: Using CrAlN multilayer coatings to improve oxidation resistance of steel interconnects for solid oxide fuel cell stacks
